simpleGame.core

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpleGame.core.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Class that allows to displayer the board and control the game.
    Author:
    Erwan Bousse

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      Constructs a Game with 2 pawns on a 4x4 board.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isGameOver()
      The game is over if there is only one pawn left or if a pawn possesses 5 gold or more.
      String moveNextPawn(Direction d)
      Moves the current pawn in a given direction.
      String toString()
      To present the state of the game: the board and is the game is over or not.

        public Game()
        Constructs a Game with 2 pawns on a 4x4 board.

    • Method Detail

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        The game is over if there is only one pawn left or if a pawn possesses 5 gold or more.
        Returns:
        true if the game is over

      • toString

        public String toString()
        To present the state of the game: the board and is the game is over or not.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        A string that describes the current state of the game.

      • moveNextPawn

        public String moveNextPawn(Direction d)
                    throws OutOfBoardException
        Moves the current pawn in a given direction.
        Parameters:
        d - The direction in which the pawn must move.
        Returns:
        A message regarding what happened.
        Throws:
        OutOfBoardException - If the move is invalid regarding the board.
